common_issues.title: LLM Download Cancellation Failure
common_issues.description: Users are unable to cancel downloading LLMs like Mistral 8 7b. The "Stop Downloading" button is unresponsive, sometimes leading to stuck initialization. This issue affects both Windows and macOS. A temporary fix involves deleting all files in "C:/Users/[YOUR-USERNAME]/Documents/com.pieces.os" and reinstalling Pieces OS and the desktop app. The Pieces team is working on a permanent solution.

### Software

Desktop Application

latest

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6e730898-a168-4571-ab0d-6331c4d389a4)

i want stop but its not working 

## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key points raised:**

* Users are experiencing issues with downloading the Mistral 8 7b model. 
* The Stop Downloading button does not work and can lead to the model being stuck in the Initialization state.
* The issue has been observed on both Windows and macOS platforms.

**Problems identified:**

* The root cause of the download issue is unclear.
* Potential contributing factors include corrupted cache files or a bug in the Pieces OS or desktop app.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* **Temporary fix:** Delete all files from the `C:/Users/[YOUR-USERNAME]/Documents/com.pieces.os` folder and reinstall Pieces OS and the desktop app.
* Other attempted fixes (unsuccessful):
    * Simply reinstalling Pieces OS and the desktop app without deleting data.
    * Reinstalling Ollama.
    * Disconnecting from the internet.
    * Restarting the machine.

**Current status/outcome:**

* The issue is still under investigation.
* The Pieces team is actively working on a permanent fix.
* Users are advised to use the temporary fix until a permanent solution is available. 

**Additional notes:**

* The Pieces team plans to completely replace the Local Large Language Model stack within the next 2-3 weeks.
* Users can schedule a meeting with the developer via the provided calendar link for real-time support.

recommendations: **Prioritize a fix for LLM download cancellations:** This issue is highly disruptive and affects multiple platforms. Allocate resources to identify the root cause and implement a permanent solution urgently.
**Improve "Stop Downloading" button functionality:** Investigate why the button is unresponsive and ensure it reliably stops LLM downloads to prevent initialization issues.
**Consider providing clearer download progress and cancellation instructions:** Enhance the user experience by making it easier to monitor and manage LLM downloads.
**Review and update the temporary fix instructions:** Ensure the provided steps for deleting files and reinstalling are accurate, safe, and easy for users to follow.

**Proactively communicate the upcoming Local LLM stack replacement:** Inform users about the planned update and its potential impact on the reported issue. This can manage expectations and reduce support requests.
